Examples.sample_text: I need to update my shipping address for my recent order.
My credit card was declined during checkout. What should I do?
The product warranty was not included in the package. How can I get it?
I received a defective item in my last order. Can I get a replacement?
I need help with setting up my new device. The instructions are unclear.
The promotional code I used didn't apply to my order. Can you assist?
I want to downgrade my subscription plan. How do I do that?
The item I received is missing some parts. Can you send the missing parts?
My account is locked after multiple failed login attempts. How can I unlock it?
I need to update my profile picture on my account.
The delivery date for my order has changed. Can you confirm the new date?
I can't find the option to cancel my order online. Can you help?
The invoice I received is incorrect. Can you send me a corrected version?
I want to change my notification preferences in my account settings.
The app is not recognizing my login credentials. What can I do?
I need to update my subscription billing cycle. Can you assist?
The package tracking information hasn't updated in days. Is it lost?
I received an extra item in my order. How should I return it?
The product description on your site is inaccurate. Can you correct it?
I can't access my purchase history. Can you help me retrieve it?
I want to reset my account password. The reset link is not working.
My order status says delivered, but I haven't received it. Can you help?
The color of the product I received is different from what I ordered.
I need to update my email address in your system.
The website is down. When will it be back up?
The discount applied to my order is incorrect. Can you fix it?
I can't find the download link for my software purchase.
The service I signed up for is not available in my area.
I want to change my payment method for my subscription.

The delivery was left outside my building. Can you reschedule it?

My subscription was automatically renewed without my permission.

The app crashes when I try to upload photos. What should I do?
I need to update my shipping preferences for future orders.
My account shows a negative balance. Can you investigate this?

The support ticket I opened hasn't been addressed. Can you expedite it?

I need to verify my identity to access my account.
My order was shipped to the wrong address. How can I correct this?

The live chat feature is not working. Can I call customer support?

My membership points are not updating after my recent purchase.

The loyalty points from my recent purchase haven't been credited.

I can't access the premium content even though I subscribed.

I would like to set up automatic bill payments from my checking account to ensure my bills are paid on time.

Examples.sample_text: My loan application status has been pending for an unusually long time. Can you provide an update on its progress?
The mobile banking app crashes every time I try to log in, making it impossible for me to access my account.
I need to change the beneficiaries on my retirement account due to recent changes in my personal circumstances.
The interest rate on my mortgage seems higher than what was initially agreed upon. Can you clarify this discrepancy?
I want to close my existing checking account because I am relocating to a different country and will be using a local bank there.
The recent security breach has me concerned about the safety of my online banking account. What measures are being taken to protect my information?
I received a notification about an overdraft fee, but my account should have sufficient funds. Can you investigate this issue?
I need to set up a wire transfer to an international account for an upcoming business transaction. Can you guide me through the process?
Examples.all_entity_action: wire transfer$set up, international account$business transaction

Examples.sample_text: The credit card reward points I earned from my recent purchases have not been credited to my account. How can this be resolved?
I am having trouble accessing my e-statements from last year. Can you help me retrieve these documents?
I would like to apply for a personal loan to cover some unexpected medical expenses. Can you provide information on the application process?
I want to enable two-factor authentication for my online banking to increase security. How can I set this up?
Dear Customer Support, I would like to request an increase in my credit card limit due to upcoming travel plans. Thank you for your assistance.
Hello, I noticed an unauthorized transaction on my bank statement. Please assist me in disputing this charge as soon as possible.
Hi, I recently moved and need to update my address and phone number in your system. Could you please guide me through the process? Thank you.
Dear Bank Team, The ATM at my local branch did not dispense the cash I requested. What should I do next to resolve this issue?
Hello, I would like to open a new savings account to help manage my finances better. Can you provide me with the necessary steps? Thanks.
Hi there, The online banking system isn't allowing me to transfer funds between my accounts. Could someone please assist with this issue?
Dear Support, I recently lost my debit card and need to report it as lost to prevent unauthorized transactions. Thank you for your prompt assistance.
Hi, I am looking to set up automatic bill payments from my checking account. Could you guide me on how to do this? Thanks in advance.
Examples.all_entity_action: automatic bill payments$set up, checking account$use

Examples.sample_text: Dear Loan Department, My loan application status has been pending for quite some time. Could you please provide me with an update? Thank you.
Hello, The mobile banking app crashes every time I try to log in. Can you assist me in resolving this issue so I can access my account?

Dear Bank Customer Service, I am writing to express my frustration with the recent issues I have encountered with my credit card. Last month, I noticed multiple unauthorized transactions on my account, amounting to a significant sum. Despite immediately reporting these fraudulent activities to your support team, I have not received any updates or resolutions. Additionally, the temporary card you provided has not yet arrived, and I am unable to use my current card due to the ongoing investigation. Please expedite the resolution process and ensure my new card is delivered promptly.
Examples.all_entity_action: unauthorized transactions$report, support team$no updates, temporary card$not arrived, resolution process$expedite

Examples.sample_text: Hello, I am reaching out because I have been experiencing significant difficulties with my mortgage account. The interest rate that was applied to my account is substantially higher than what was initially agreed upon during the application process. I have tried contacting your mortgage department multiple times, but my calls and emails have gone unanswered. This discrepancy has caused undue financial strain, and I urgently need assistance to rectify this issue. Please have a representative contact me to discuss adjusting the interest rate to the correct amount and refunding any overpaid interest.
Examples.all_entity_action: interest rate$discrepancy, mortgage department$unresponsive, financial strain$rectify, interest rate$adjust, overpaid interest$refund

Examples.sample_text: Dear Support Team, I recently applied for a business loan to support the expansion of my company. Despite submitting all required documentation and following up diligently, the application status remains pending, and it has been over two months since I first applied. This delay is severely impacting my business operations, as we had planned to use the funds for a critical project. I am requesting an immediate review and approval of my loan application. Additionally, I need to know the exact reasons for this delay and the steps being taken to expedite the approval process.
Examples.all_entity_action: business loan$application, application status$pending, business operations$impact, loan application$review, approval process$expedite

Examples.sample_text: To Whom It May Concern, I am writing to address a serious issue with my recent account statement. There are multiple errors, including duplicate charges and missing credits that were supposed to be applied from returned items. I have been on hold with customer service for hours and have yet to speak to a representative who can resolve these discrepancies. This is causing significant stress as it impacts my account balance and financial planning. I require an immediate correction to my statement, a detailed explanation of how these errors occurred, and assurance that my account will be properly monitored going forward.
Examples.all_entity_action: account statement$errors, duplicate charges$correction, missing credits$apply, customer service$unresponsive, account balance$impact, financial planning$disruption

Examples.sample_text: Hello Customer Service, I am writing to escalate a problem I have been facing with the online banking portal. For the past several weeks, I have been unable to access my account due to a technical issue that your IT department has not been able to resolve. Each time I attempt to log in, I receive an error message stating that my credentials are invalid, despite resetting my password multiple times. This issue is preventing me from managing my finances, paying bills, and transferring funds. I need a high-priority resolution and compensation for any late fees incurred due to this problem.
Examples.all_entity_action: online banking portal$access issue, IT department$unresolved, credentials$invalid, password$reset, finances$manage, bills$pay, funds$transfer, resolution$high-priority, late fees$compensation

Examples.sample_text: Dear Bank Manager, I am writing to report a severe problem with the customer support service I received regarding my home equity line of credit (HELOC). Despite being promised a follow-up call within 48 hours, I have not heard back from your team in over a week. The issue pertains to a sudden and unexplained increase in my HELOC interest rate, which was supposed to be fixed for the duration of the term. This change has significantly increased my monthly payments, and I am now at risk of defaulting on my obligations. I demand an immediate investigation and correction of my interest rate, as well as a formal apology for the poor customer service.
Examples.all_entity_action: HELOC$interest rate increase, customer support$poor service, follow-up call$missing, interest rate$fixed term, monthly payments$increase, default$risk, interest rate$correct, formal apology$request

Examples.sample_text: Hello, I am contacting you regarding a dispute over the handling of my credit card fraud case. Several months ago, I reported unauthorized charges totaling over $1,000 on my credit card. Despite numerous communications with your fraud department and assurances that the issue would be resolved swiftly, these charges have not been refunded, and the investigation appears to have stalled. This delay is unacceptable and has caused significant stress and financial hardship. I require an immediate update on the status of my case, a timeline for resolution, and a refund of the disputed charges.
Examples.all_entity_action: credit card fraud$dispute, unauthorized charges$refund, fraud department$unresponsive, investigation$stalled, stress$cause, financial hardship$impact, case$status update, charges$refund

Examples.sample_text: Dear Support Team, I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the recent update to your mobile banking app. Since the update, I have experienced numerous glitches, including app crashes, slow loading times, and inaccurate display of my account balances. These issues are severely impacting my ability to conduct essential banking activities, such as checking my balance, transferring funds, and depositing checks. Despite reinstalling the app and reaching out to your technical support, the problems persist. I need these technical issues addressed immediately and compensation for any inconvenience caused.
Examples.all_entity_action: mobile banking app$update issues, app crashes$experience, loading times$slow, account balances$inaccurate, banking activities$impact, technical support$unresolved, issues$address, compensation$request

Examples.sample_text: To Whom It May Concern, I am writing to bring to your attention a serious problem with my joint account. Recently, I noticed several unauthorized withdrawals that neither I nor my co-account holder authorized. Despite contacting your customer service multiple times, I have not received any satisfactory explanation or resolution. This situation is causing significant concern as it impacts our ability to manage our finances securely. I demand a thorough investigation into these unauthorized withdrawals, immediate reversal of the charges, and a detailed report on how this breach occurred.
Examples.all_entity_action: joint account$unauthorized withdrawals, customer service$no resolution, finances$manage securely, investigation$thorough, charges$reversal, breach$report

Examples.sample_text: Dear Bank Team, I am writing to report a persistent problem with the automated bill payment system linked to my checking account. For the past three months, several of my utility bills have either been paid late or not at all, despite having sufficient funds in my account. This has resulted in late fees and service interruptions that have caused significant inconvenience. I have spoken to your support team on multiple occasions, but the issue remains unresolved. I require an immediate fix to the automated payment system, reimbursement for all late fees, and assurance that my future payments will be processed correctly.
Examples.all_entity_action: automated bill payment$system issue, utility bills$late payment, funds$sufficient, late fees$reimbursement, service interruptions$inconvenience, support team$unresolved, payment system$fix, future payments$assurance

I demand a replacement of the correct item, proper packaging this time, and compensation for the inconvenience caused.

Examples.sample_text: Hello, I placed an order for a new laptop two weeks ago, and the delivery status still shows 'processing'.
